hero.headline: Let's Design Your Nature-Inspired Story
hero.subheadline: Collaborative botanical artistry rooted in personal meaning
hero.bodyCopy: Working together to translate your connection with nature into refined botanical tattoos that honor organic beauty and your personal journey.

recommendationCard.title: Based on your love for refined botanical work with personal meaning
recommendationCard.description: We recommend Wendy—her collaborative approach brings nature-inspired visions to life through delicate, meaningful botanical line work.

hero.headline: Master Craftsmen of Traditional Tattoo Art
hero.subheadline: Award-winning artists delivering bold, timeless work
hero.bodyCopy: Led by internationally acclaimed artist Eva Karabudak, our master tattooers bring decades of experience to traditional and neo-traditional work. Every piece is executed with museum-quality precision.

recommendationCard.title: Based on your appreciation for bold traditional work and expert craftsmanship
recommendationCard.description: We recommend Eva—founder and internationally acclaimed fine art tattooer with award-winning traditional and bold artistic vision.

hero.headline: Let's Design Your Geometric Story
hero.subheadline: Collaborative design sessions for refined, meaningful line work
hero.bodyCopy: We specialize in working closely with you to translate your personal vision into clean geometric tattoos that celebrate your story with minimalist precision.

recommendationCard.title: Based on your preferences for refined geometric work with personal meaning
recommendationCard.description: We recommend Mishka—she specializes in collaborative geometric design sessions that bring meaningful concepts to life through precise line work.

hero.headline: Bold Tattoos That Make a Statement
hero.subheadline: Eye-catching traditional work for those who dare
hero.bodyCopy: For those who decide with confidence—striking traditional tattoos that command attention and tell your story loudly.

recommendationCard.title: Based on your love for bold, statement-making traditional work
recommendationCard.description: We recommend Eva—her bold traditional style creates unforgettable pieces that make powerful statements.

hero.headline: Exquisite Botanical Artistry Worth the Wait
hero.subheadline: Museum-quality botanical tattoos crafted with precision
hero.bodyCopy: For those who appreciate meticulous research and planning—delicate botanical work that showcases nature's beauty through expert craftsmanship.

recommendationCard.title: Based on your appreciation for refined botanical work and quality craftsmanship
recommendationCard.description: We recommend Wendy—her precise botanical work combines extensive research with exceptional execution.
